pkg.name: dropdown-menu
pkg.title: Dropdown menu
pkg.description: The Dropdown menu component displays an accessible dropdown menu to the user, such as a set of actions or links.

scope.title: Dropdown menu
scope.description: The Dropdown menu component displays an accessible dropdown menu to the user, such as a set of actions or links.

relatedComponents.name: combobox
relatedComponents.title: Combobox
relatedComponents.description: This component allows users to select from a list of options. It's especially useful when there are many options to choose from.

relatedComponents.name: select
relatedComponents.title: Select
relatedComponents.description: Select provides a way for users to choose one item from a collapsible list. It helps reduce input errors and screen space.
